name: Air Raid 2023 (Valax321)
description:
Note: this is a reupload of the game, which was originally available on While False Studios. It has been moved here to separate studio and solo projects.

The evil Others are coming! You must use your radar-equipped anti aircraft gun to shoot down enemy fighters while avoiding friendlies. Use bombs to destroy everything in a small area.

This game was developed by Andrew Castillo for a university project: the task was developing a game that only uses a single button for input. It was developed using Javascript, so Andrew has now lost his mental faculties.
